name: Void Prisoner
description:
Game about a exile who was thrown into dark void. He's only chance is his power to see another dimensions.

Controls:
WASD for moving

SPACE for jumping
Left & Right Mouse Click for Visions

Franciszek Fasolka
Gabriele Picco
Igor Kurek
Maciek Sozański
Szymek Dmitruk
Karol Kłusek
